participant_1.name: Ella Thompson
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Ella enjoys expressing herself through storytelling and values connection with others.
participant_1.background: My family is a family of storytellers, and we are all passionate about sharing our stories with the world. My mom is a music teacher at the elementary school. I lift weights and eat healthy to stay in shape. I never eat veggies. I listen to the wind howl outside my window, enjoying the cold air and the solitude.

participant_2.name: Jake Harris
participant_2.personality: Curious and inventive, Jake loves to explore and create, always looking for new projects to tackle.
participant_2.background: I enjoy tinkering and building things in my spare time. I enjoy cooking ethnic foods and listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers. I'm about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon. I am from Tennessee. I enjoy making things for my family.

content.text: What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to tinker and build things.
That sounds fun, what are some of the things you have built?
I have built a few bird houses and some other small things. I really enjoy working with my hands.
That's cool, I love hearing about what people do in their spare time.
What do you like to do?
I am a lifter, I eat healthy and stay in shape. I also love listening to stories and telling them myself.
That's interesting, what kind of stories do you like to tell?
I like to tell stories about my family and the things we have done together. I also like to tell stories about the things I have experienced in my life.
That's really cool, I love hearing stories about people's lives. I am sure your family has a lot of great stories to tell.
They do, we are all big storytellers.
That's awesome, I am sure you have a lot of great stories to tell too.
Thank you, I hope so too.
